snippet: With a heart-breaking injury record at the Australian Open, few would blame Rafa Nadal for a feeling of trepidation every time he enters Melbourne Park but the fit and healthy Spaniard will begin this year's campaign full of "happy feelings"....
lead_paragraph: With a heart-breaking injury record at the Australian Open, few would blame Rafa Nadal for a feeling of trepidation every time he enters Melbourne Park but the fit and healthy Spaniard will begin this year's campaign full of "happy feelings".

headline.print_headline: Fit Nadal Brings 'Happy Feelings' to Melbourne Park
headline.main: Fit Nadal Brings 'Happy Feelings' to Melbourne Park
